title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Trump Administration Pulls Back From Local Police Oversight Across U.S.

items.title: The pace of innovation in tech has accelerated from years to months thanks to AI, Microsoft chief privacy officer says
items.description: "Now the pace of innovation has just accelerated. What used to take years to get out now takes months," Julie Brill said.

items.title: Chris Brown is out on bail after allegedly assaulting a music producer during his last tour. His next world tour starts next month
items.description: A prosecutor said Brown punched, kicked, and struck Abe Diaw several times with a bottle. The attack was caught on camera in a club full of people.

items.title: Why Washington’s Huge Tax Bill Is Worrying Bond Investors
items.description: Tax cuts pushed by President Trump are amplifying debt and deficit concerns among the powerful market players who influence interest rates.

items.title: ‘Self-deporting’ immigrants are pulling their kids out of school to flee the U.S. Experts say it spells trouble for schools that depend on student enrollments for funding
items.description: "Every student that walks in the door gets a chunk of money with it, not just federal money, but state and local money, too."

items.title: School Bus Bombing in Pakistan Kills at Least 6, Including 4 Students
items.description: The vehicle was carrying dozens of children to a military-run school in southwestern Balochistan Province, a region long roiled by rebel activity.

items.title: European Parliament VP discovered there was nowhere in the building to change a diaper—it took the length of her pregnancy to change that
items.description: Silvana Koch-Merin said "glass walls" exist in parliament that stop women working in more technical roles.

items.title: What if Making Cartoons Becomes 90% Cheaper?
items.description: A.I. has yet to upend Hollywood. But it is starting to make big inroads in animation.

items.title: Putin Visits Kursk for First Time Since Russia Drove Out Ukrainian Forces
items.description: The Russian leader traveled to the region in the west of the country where a surprise incursion last year embarrassed Moscow.
